---
title: "Syllabi for courses in the CUNY SPS Master's of Data Science program"
date: "`r paste(params$semester, params$year)`"
output: github_document
editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: console
params:
  semester: "Spring"
  year: "2021"
---

```{r, echo=FALSE, error=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='asis'}
library(rmarkdown)

courses <- list.files(pattern = 'DATA*')
for(i in courses) {
	y <- yaml_front_matter(paste0(i, '/', i, '.Rmd'))
	file <- paste0(i, '/', i, '-', params$year, '-', params$semester, '.html')
	url <- paste0('https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/CUNY-MSDS/syllabi/blob/main/',
				   file)
	if(file.exists(file)) {
		cat(paste0('* [', y$title, '](', url, ')\n'))
	} else {
		cat(y$title)
	}
}
```
